verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came also unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
Thou shalt not \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, neither shalt thou have \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* or \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* concerning the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and concerning the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* that are \w born|strong="H3205"\w* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and concerning their \w mothers|strong="H0517"\w* that \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* them, and concerning their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* that \w begat|strong="H3209"\w* them in this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*;

They shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* of \w grievous|strong="H8463"\w* \w deaths|strong="H4463"\w*; they shall not be \w lamented|strong="H5594"\w*; neither shall they be \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*; \add but\add* they shall be as \w dung|strong="H1828"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*: and they shall be \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and by \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*; and their \w carcases|strong="H5038"\w* shall be \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* for the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and for the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w Enter|strong="H0935"\w* not into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w mourning|strong="H4798"\w*, neither \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* nor \w bemoan|strong="H5110"\w* them: for I have taken \w away|strong="H0622"\w* my \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* from this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add even\add* \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* and \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*.  +  r 16.5  t mourning: or, mourning feast *

Both the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and the \w small|strong="H6996"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: they shall not be \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*, neither shall \add men\add* \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* for them, nor \w cut|strong="H1413"\w* themselves, nor make themselves \w bald|strong="H7139"\w* for them:

Neither shall \add men\add* \w tear|strong="H6536"\w* \add themselves\add* for them in \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w*, to \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* them for the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*; neither shall \add men\add* give them the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* of \w consolation|strong="H8575"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* for their \w father|strong="H0001"\w* or for their \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.\f + \fr 16.7 \ft tear…: or, break bread for them\f*

Thou shalt not also \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w*, to \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* with them to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Behold, I will cause to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* out of this \w place|strong="H4725"\w* in your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and in your \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w mirth|strong="H8342"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w bridegroom|strong="H2860"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w bride|strong="H3618"\w*.

¶ And it shall come to pass, when thou shalt \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, Wherefore hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* all this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against us? or what \add is\add* our \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*? or what \add is\add* our \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* that we have \w committed|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

Then shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Because your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and have \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and have \w served|strong="H5647"\w* them, and have \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* them, and have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and have not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*;

And ye have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w worse|strong="H7489"\w* than your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; for, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, ye \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w imagination|strong="H8307"\w* of his \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, that they may not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me:\f + \fr 16.12 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*

Therefore will I \w cast|strong="H2904"\w* you out of this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* into a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that ye \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not, \add neither\add* ye nor your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; and there shall ye \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*; where I will not \w shew|strong="H5414"\w* you \w favour|strong="H2594"\w*.

¶ Therefore, behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that it shall no more be \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, that brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*;

But, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, that brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and from all the \w lands|strong="H0776"\w* whither he had \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* them: and I will bring them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* into their \w land|strong="H0127"\w* that I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

¶ Behold, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* for \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w fishers|strong="H1771"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and they shall \w fish|strong="H1770"\w* them; and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* will I \w send|strong="H7971"\w* for \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w hunters|strong="H6719"\w*, and they shall \w hunt|strong="H6679"\w* them from every \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and from every \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*, and out of the \w holes|strong="H5357"\w* of the \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*.

For mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \add are\add* upon all their \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: they are not \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* from my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, neither is their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w hid|strong="H6845"\w* \w from|strong="H5048"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

And \w first|strong="H7223"\w* I will \w recompense|strong="H7999"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* and their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w double|strong="H4932"\w*; because they have \w defiled|strong="H2490"\w* my \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, they have \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* mine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* with the \w carcases|strong="H5038"\w* of their \w detestable|strong="H8251"\w* and abominable \w things|strong="H8441"\w*.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, my \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, and my \w fortress|strong="H4581"\w*, and my \w refuge|strong="H4498"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w affliction|strong="H6869"\w*, the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee from the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w inherited|strong="H5157"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, and \add things\add* wherein \add there is\add* no \w profit|strong="H3276"\w*.
Shall a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* unto himself, and they \add are\add* no \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*?

Therefore, behold, I will this \w once|strong="H6471"\w* cause them to \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, I will cause them to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* and my \w might|strong="H1369"\w*; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 16.21 \ft The \+nd LORD\+nd*: or, \+nd JEHOVAH\+nd*\f*
